flawed_nl_solution:
Marge had 23 - 5 = <<23-5=18>>18 seeds grow into plants.
Rabbits ate 18 / 3 = <<18/3=6>>6 plants.
There were 18 - 6 = <<18-6=21>>21 plants left.
Weeds strangled 21 / 3 = <<21/3=7>>7 plants.
She had 21 - 7 = <<21-7=14>>14 plants left.
Marge kept 1 weed, so she ended up with 14 + 1 = <<14+1=15>>15 plants.
#### 15

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
